trans-unit.source: The base exception type for all COM interop exceptions and structured exception handling (SEH) exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 所有 COM 互操作异常和结构化的异常处理 (SEH) 异常的异常基类型。

trans-unit.source: To enhance interoperability between legacy systems and the common language runtime, the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A> property stores an integer value (HRESULT) that identifies the error.
trans-unit.target: 若要增强旧系统和公共语言运行时之间的互操作性<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>属性存储一个整数值 (HRESULT)，标识错误。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: User defined exceptions should never derive from `ExternalException`, and an `ExternalException` should never be thrown by user code.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的异常应永远不会派生自`ExternalException`，和`ExternalException`永远不应由用户代码引发。

trans-unit.source: Use the specific exceptions that derive from `ExternalException` instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用派生自的特定异常`ExternalException`相反。

trans-unit.source: `ExternalException` uses the HRESULT E_FAIL which has the value 0x80004005.
trans-unit.target: `ExternalException`使用具有值 0x80004005 HRESULT E_FAIL。

trans-unit.source: `ExternalException` uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: `ExternalException`使用默认<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支持引用相等性的实现。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial values for an instance of `ExternalException`, see the `ExternalException` constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关初始的实例值的列表`ExternalException`，请参阅`ExternalException`构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref>使用默认属性的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值`ExternalException`。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值`ExternalException`。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that specifies the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 指定异常的原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class from serialization data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref>从序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with a specified error message and the HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref>使用指定的错误消息和错误的 HRESULT 的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值`ExternalException`。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>|The HRESULT of the error.| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>|错误的 HRESULT。 | |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that specifies the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 指定异常的原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref> of the error.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref>的错误。

trans-unit.source: See [Common HRESULT values](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137.aspx) for a list of the more frequently encountered error codes.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[常见的 HRESULT 值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137.aspx)越多的列表经常遇到的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: `HRESULT` values are defined in the Winerror.h header file.
trans-unit.target: `HRESULT`Winerror.h 标头文件中定义值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref> of the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""> </xref>的错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，包含错误的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 HRESULT。
